title: "KNIME & ESG's State of Data Science and Machine Learning Report Highlights Critical Opportunities for More Effective AI & ML"
excerpt: "Advancements in AI have moved data-driven decision making to the top of the agenda for virtually every organization. That's why KNIME and research firm ESG surveyed more than 350 data scientists, business and IT decision makers involved with data science and machine learning technology and processes to show the current state of AI and machine learning operations (MLOps) initiatives."
